text: William Scott "Scotty" Bowman (born September 18, 1933 in Montreal, Quebec, Canada) is a former National Hockey League head coach. He holds the record for most wins with 1,244. ==Early years== Bowman was born on September 18, 1933 in Verdun, Quebec. He played minor league hockey until a fractured skull resulting from a slash by Jean-Guy Talbot ended his playing aspirations.The Game, Ken Dryden, p.36, Published by Macmillan Canada, 1993, ==References== == Other websites == * * * Category:1933 births Category:Canadian ice hockey coaches Category:Hockey Hall of Fame inductees Category:Jack Adams Award winners Category:Living people
title: Scotty Bowman
